Sam Granger

Welcome to my Site


My name is Sam Granger. I'm a web developer and artist with a knack for bringing people together and making insights happen. In the past I've worked as a editor, teacher, marketer, and documentary filmwriter. Now, I'm busy being an architect of code and creating spaces on the web for information and interaction. My background in cognition always keeps me "thinking about thinking" and thinking about how beautiful design helps us think better. When I'm not working or thinking, I'm usually playing guitar, learning a new language, or being spending my time in the waters and the woods of my home state of Michigan.


I'm always looking for new problems to solve, new projects to take on, and new people to meet. So take a look around and feel free to drop me a line.

Work

I've always been a jack of trades and master of some

A background in art, photography, and poetry gave me an attentiveness to notice the things around me and the skill needed to translating them into a new medium to share with others. Drawing has been in my life ever since I could hold a pencil. Translating the contours of a plant's leaves or the intricacies of a person's expression into the lines on my paper was a training in attention.

Resume

Q's: What have you done? What can you do? I've done a lot of different things. Teaching, marketing, sales, documentary film work.
